name: nightscout
description: An MCP server for interacting with the Nightscout API.

tools.name: get_entries
tools.description: Retrieves entries from the user's Nightscout instance. Entries can be of various types, such as `sgv` (sensor glucose value), `mbg` (meter blood glucose), `cal` (calibration), etc.

count.description: The number of entries to return. Defaults to 100.

find.description: A query object to filter the results. Supports nested queries (e.g., { "type": "sgv", "sgv": { "$gte": 180 } }).
